title: Make it a Quote Privacy policy
warning:
This page is an English translation of the Japanese version of the Privacy policy.
In the event of any discrepancy between the Japanese version and this page, the Japanese version shall prevail.
description: Neody has established the following privacy policy (hereinafter referred to as the "Policy") regarding the handling of users' personal information in the services provided on Discord.

collection.title: Collection of personal information
collection.content:
Neody temporarily uses

  • User icon URL
  • Usernames
  • User IDs
  • Message content

When generating images.

This information is not saved and is discarded once the image generation is complete. (Usually occurs in less than 1 second)

purpose.title: What is this information used for?
purpose.content:
The purposes for which Neody collects and uses personal information are as follows.

  • Generating an image from the requested message

change_use.title: Change of use of personal information
change_use.content:
Neody will only change the use of personal information when new features may require more information. Personal information will not be used for purposes unrelated to the service being provided.

If a change of use of personal information is in order, users will be notified through the varios channels provided by Neody.

change_policy.title: Change of privacy policy
change_policy.content:
The contents of this policy may be changed without notice to users, except for laws and other matters otherwise specified in this policy.

Unless otherwise specified by Neody, the revised privacy policy will become effective from the time it is posted on this website.
